import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; var iamgecart = 'cake1.jpg' export default function CartItem(props) { var [itemcount , setitemcount]=useState(1) var [cakelist, setCakelist] =useState({}) const history = useHistory(); function additem(){ var spanitemcount =parseInt(document.getElementById("cartitemcount").innerText) console.log(itemcount) spanitemcount+=1 setitemcount(spanitemcount) } function removeitem(){ var spanitemcount = document.getElementById("cartitemcount").innerText if(spanitemcount>1) { spanitemcount-=1 setitemcount(spanitemcount) } } useEffect(()=>{ let apiurl = "https://apifromashu.herokuapp.com/api/cakecart" axios( { headers:{authtoken:localStorage.token}, method:'post', url:apiurl } ).then((response)=>{ setCakelist(response.data.data) console.log(cakelist) },(error)=>{ console.log("error from all cakes api" , error) }) }, []) const cakeitemlist = calelist.map((post) =>

{post.title}
